4ZD.F.summary: Penneo ApS, a software-as-a-service company, provides an eco-system of automation solutions that digitizes companies' workflows of signing and managing documents. It digitizes, automates, and secures digital document handling workflows. The company serves customers in various industries, such as property management, finance, real estate, HR, and legal. Penneo ApS was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

50O.F.summary: Shape Robotics A/S, an educational technology company, develops robot systems for education purpose worldwide. It develops Fable, a robot system that offers educational robot kits for use in teaching programs, robotics, and innovations in middle and secondary schools, as well as in universities. The company serves schools, municipalities, libraries, high-schools, vocational schools, coding clubs, and other private and public education institutions. It sells its products directly, as well as through distributors and resellers. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Farum, Denmark.

5IJ.F.summary: Conferize A/S develops an online software solution for event and conference market. Its primary product is event management software, which enables event organizers to solve various digital tasks needed to host an event. The company serves event organizers and attendees. It operates in approximately 140 countries. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

9R6.F.summary: Scape Technologies A/S, an automation and software company, develops, sells, and delivers bin-picking solutions based on 3D computer vision systems. Its SCAPE software is suitable for handling random, structured, and semi-structured components. Scape Technologies A/S was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Odense, Denmark.

AGILC.CO.summary: Agillic A/S, a software company, provides marketing automation solution that serves as a platform for loyalty clubs and customer communication across all channels in Denmark, Nordic countries, and internationally. It offers Agillic AI Engine, which uses front-line data analytics and mathematical models to predict and analyses customer behavior, as well as omnichannel marketing, training, on-boarding, and professional services. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

BETCO.ST.summary: Better Collective A/S, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a sports betting media company worldwide. It connects sports enthusiastic bettors with betting operators through various technologies and digital media products. The company primarily focuses on online sports betting and casino marketing platforms. It operates various community-based digital platforms, including bettingexpert.com, speltips.se, and spilXperten.dk, as well as owns and operates Esport websites HLTV.org and Dust2.dk. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

CBRAIN.CO.summary: cBrain A/S, a software company, develops software for government, unions, and private knowledge firms in Denmark. It provides cBrain F2, a software tool that digitizes various workflows, knowledge processing, records management, and communication, including social media, as well as supports PCs and mobiles/tablets. The company is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

CONFRZ.CO.summary: Conferize A/S develops an online software solution for event and conference market. Its primary product is event management software, which enables event organizers to solve various digital tasks needed to host an event. The company serves event organizers and attendees. It operates in approximately 140 countries. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

ENALYZ.CO.summary: Enalyzer A/S provides solutions for the measurement and analysis of employee satisfaction, and customer and citizen views on various topics worldwide. The company offers Enalyzer, a software product for running surveys. It also provides consulting, training, and support services. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

FASTPC.CO.summary: FastPassCorp A/S provides enterprise password management solutions for enterprises and managed service providers in Denmark. It offers Fastpass Enterprise Password Manager for password self-service and compliance for corporations; Facilitated Password Reset for the service desk process; Fastpass Cloud Password Manager, a Web based password manager for medium and large companies who want to improve productivity and security related to password self-service processes; MSP password management self-service; and password synchronization solutions. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Gladsaxe, Denmark.

HYPE.CO.summary: Hypefactors A/S operates as a software company that provides a technology platform. The company operates an artificial intelligence-based PR automation platform to power the PR workflow and various facts to document the results. It serves enterprises, small and medium sized companies, and PR agencies. The company is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

KONSOL.CO.summary: Konsolidator A/S develops and sells cloud based solutions. The company offers Konsolidator, a cloud-based financial consolidation software solutions. It also provides consultancy services. Konsolidator A/S was founded in 2016 and is based in SÃ¸borg, Denmark.

NANN.summary: Nanovation Microtech, Inc. develops and sells applications and games for iPhone, iPad, and Apple watches. The company was formerly known as Kalmin Corp. and changed its name to Nanovation Microtech, Inc. in July 2020. The company was founded in 2016 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark. Nanovation Microtech, Inc. is a subsidiary of Greenfield International Limited.

PENNEO.CO.summary: Penneo ApS, a software-as-a-service company, provides an eco-system of automation solutions that digitizes companies' workflows of signing and managing documents. It digitizes, automates, and secures digital document handling workflows. The company serves customers in various industries, such as property management, finance, real estate, HR, and legal. Penneo ApS was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

REALFI.ST.summary: Realfiction Holding AB (publ) manufactures and sells mixed reality solutions for retail, education, events, and brand activations worldwide. The company offers DeepFrame, a mixed-reality display system; Dreamoc HD3, a platform for grabbing attention in commercial setting; Dreamoc POP3, a display to create attention around a campaign or product launch; and Dreamoc XL3, a mixed reality display solution for spaces, such as retail focal points, hotel lobbies, or office reception areas. It also provides Dreamoc XXL3, a mixed reality display and optimal solution for creating experiences in environments, such as malls, museums, and busy trade fairs; and Dreamoc Diamond, a display solutions for events and brand activations in shopping malls, trade fairs, and other traffic locations. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.

SCAPE.CO.summary: Scape Technologies A/S, an automation and software company, develops, sells, and delivers bin-picking solutions based on 3D computer vision systems. Its SCAPE software is suitable for handling random, structured, and semi-structured components. Scape Technologies A/S was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Odense, Denmark.

SHAPE.CO.summary: Shape Robotics A/S, an educational technology company, develops robot systems for education purpose worldwide. It develops Fable, a robot system that offers educational robot kits for use in teaching programs, robotics, and innovations in middle and secondary schools, as well as in universities. The company serves schools, municipalities, libraries, high-schools, vocational schools, coding clubs, and other private and public education institutions. It sells its products directly, as well as through distributors and resellers. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Farum, Denmark.

SIM.CO.summary: SimCorp A/S, together with its subsidiaries, provides investment management solutions for asset management, fund management, insurance, life/pension, asset servicing, treasury, sovereign wealth, and wealth management companies, as well as central banks. It provides SimCorp Dimension, an integrated system, which provides multi-asset class support across the investment value chain; SimCorp Sofia, a front-to-back investment management solution for the Italian insurance market; SimCorp Gain, an enterprise data management solution for reference and market data management; and SimCorp Coric, a solution for client communications and reporting automation. The company offers front office solutions, including alternative investment, asset, order, and compliance manager; middle office solutions, such as performance, risk analysis, and strategy manager; and back office solutions comprising cash and securities, collateral, corporate actions, fund administration, general ledger, investment accounting, and settlement manager. It also provides data and reporting solutions that include client communications, data warehouse, reconciliation, and enterprise data manager. In addition, the company offers regulatory compliance, managed business and data analytics, managed application, operational, training, infrastructure and platform, and value acceleration services. The company has operations in the United Kingdom, Northern Europe, the Middle East, Central Europe, Southern Europe, Asia, Australia, North America, and APAC countries. SimCorp A/S was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.

XCL1.F.summary: SimCorp A/S, together with its subsidiaries, provides investment management solutions for asset management, fund management, insurance, life/pension, asset servicing, treasury, sovereign wealth, and wealth management companies, as well as central banks. It provides SimCorp Dimension, an integrated system, which provides multi-asset class support across the investment value chain; SimCorp Sofia, a front-to-back investment management solution for the Italian insurance market; SimCorp Gain, an enterprise data management solution for reference and market data management; and SimCorp Coric, a solution for client communications and reporting automation. The company offers front office solutions, including alternative investment, asset, order, and compliance manager; middle office solutions, such as performance, risk analysis, and strategy manager; and back office solutions comprising cash and securities, collateral, corporate actions, fund administration, general ledger, investment accounting, and settlement manager. It also provides data and reporting solutions that include client communications, data warehouse, reconciliation, and enterprise data manager. In addition, the company offers regulatory compliance, managed business and data analytics, managed application, operational, training, infrastructure and platform, and value acceleration services. The company has operations in the United Kingdom, Northern Europe, the Middle East, Central Europe, Southern Europe, Asia, Australia, North America, and APAC countries. SimCorp A/S was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Copenhagen, Denmark.
